MemberSignature.Value: public static string DownloadTensorFlowSentimentModel ();
.method public static hidebysig string DownloadTensorFlowSentimentModel() cil managed
Public Shared Function DownloadTensorFlowSentimentModel () As String
static member DownloadTensorFlowSentimentModel : unit -> string

Docs.summary: Downloads sentiment_model from the dotnet/machinelearning-testdata repo.
Docs.remarks: The model is downloaded from https://github.com/dotnet/machinelearning-testdata/blob/296625f4e49d50fcd6a48a0d92bea7584e198c0f/Microsoft.ML.TensorFlow.TestModels/sentiment_model The model is in 'SavedModel' format. For further explanation on how was the `sentiment_model` created c.f. https://github.com/dotnet/machinelearning-testdata/blob/296625f4e49d50fcd6a48a0d92bea7584e198c0f/Microsoft.ML.TensorFlow.TestModels/sentiment_model/README.md

Docs.param: used for data loading and processing.
Docs.summary: Returns the path to the Adult UCI dataset and featurizes it to be suitable for classification tasks.
Docs.remarks: For more details about this dataset, please see https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/adult.
